name: Jubilee - Don't Play This
description:
Click and drag to rotate the camera.  Scroll to zoom in and out.

Click the bottom plane to send the Chameleon tongue out to grab the YELLOW OBJECTS.  See how many you can get!  Post your high score!  

Jubilee's "Don't Play This" EP OUT NOW: 

https://jubilee.ffm.to/dontplaythis

And more on Magic City: 

https://magiccity.bandcamp.com/
